board

Class BasicBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • board.BasicBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoutingBoard

    public class BasicBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Provides basic functionality of a board with geometric items. Contains functions such as inserting, deleting, modifying and picking items and elementary checking functions. A board may have 1 or several layers.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      The layer structure of this board.
      BoardLibrary library
      The library containing pastack masks, packagages and other templates used on the board.
      BoardRules rules
      Class defining the rules for items to be inserted into this board.
      SearchTreeManager search_tree_manager
      Handels the search trees pointing into the items of this board

      Creates a new instance of a routing Board with surrrounding box p_bounding_box Rules contains the restrictions to obey when inserting items.

      Turns an obstacle area into a conduction area with net number p_net_no If it is convex and has no holes, it is turned into a Pin, alse into a conduction area.

      Restores the sitiation before the last undo.

      Looks for traces of the input net on the input layer, so that p_location is on the trace polygon, and splits these traces.

      starts notifying the observers of any change in the objects list

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicBoard

        public BasicBoard(IntBox p_bounding_box,
                  LayerStructure p_layer_structure,
                  PolylineShape[] p_outline_shapes,
                  int p_outline_cl_class_no,
                  BoardRules p_rules,
                  Communication p_communication,
                  TestLevel p_test_level)
        Creates a new instance of a routing Board with surrrounding box p_bounding_box Rules contains the restrictions to obey when inserting items. Among other things it may contain a clearance matrix. p_observers is used for syncronisation, if the board is generated by a host database. Otherwise it is null. If p_test_level != RELEASE_VERSION,, some features may be used, which are still in experimental state. Also warnings for debugging may be printed depending on the size of p_test_level.
        Parameters:
        p_bounding_box - a IntBox object.
        p_layer_structure - a LayerStructure object.
        p_outline_shapes - an array of PolylineShape objects.
        p_outline_cl_class_no - a int.
        p_rules - a rules$BoardRules object.
        p_communication - a Communication object.
        p_test_level - a TestLevel object.

    • Method Detail

      • insert_trace_without_cleaning

        public PolylineTrace insert_trace_without_cleaning(Polyline p_polyline,
                                                   int p_layer,
                                                   int p_half_width,
                                                   int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                                   int p_clearance_class,
                                                   FixedState p_fixed_state)
        Inserts a trace into the board, whose geometry is described by a Polyline. p_clearance_class is the index in the clearance_matix, which describes the required clearance restrictions to other items. Because no internal cleaning of items is done, the new inserted item can be returned.
        Parameters:
        p_polyline - a Polyline object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_half_width - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_clearance_class - a int.
        p_fixed_state - a FixedState object.
        Returns:
        a PolylineTrace object.

        public ObstacleArea insert_obstacle(Area p_area,
                                    int p_layer,
                                    int p_clearance_class,
                                    FixedState p_fixed_state)
        Inserts an obstacle into the board , whose geometry is described by a polygonyal shape, which may have holes. If p_component_no != 0, the obstacle belongs to a component.

        p_layer - a int.
        p_clearance_class - a int.

        a ObstacleArea object.

      • insert_conduction_area

        public ConductionArea insert_conduction_area(Area p_area,
                                             int p_layer,
                                             int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                             int p_clearance_class,
                                             boolean p_is_obstacle,
                                             FixedState p_fixed_state)
        Inserts a condution area into the board , whose geometry is described by a polygonyal shape, which may have holes. If p_is_obstacle is false, it is possible to route through the conduction area with traces and vias of foreign nets.
        Parameters:
        p_area - a Area object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_clearance_class - a int.
        p_is_obstacle - a boolean.
        p_fixed_state - a FixedState object.
        Returns:
        a ConductionArea object.

        public boolean combine_traces(int p_net_no)

        Parameters:

                            int p_layer,
                            int p_net_no)

      • overlapping_objects

        public java.util.Set<SearchTreeObject> overlapping_objects(ConvexShape p_shape,
                                                           int p_layer)
        Returns all SearchTreeObjects on layer p_layer, which overlap with p_shape. If p_layer < 0, the layer is ignored
        Parameters:
        p_shape - a ConvexShape object.
        p_layer - a int.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • overlapping_items_with_clearance

        public java.util.Set<Item> overlapping_items_with_clearance(ConvexShape p_shape,
                                                            int p_layer,
                                                            int[] p_ignore_net_nos,
                                                            int p_clearance_class)
        Returns items, which overlap with p_shape on layer p_layer inclusive clearance. p_clearance_class is the index in the clearance matrix, which describes the required clearance restrictions to other items. The function may also return items, which are nearly overlapping, but do not overlap with exact calculation. If p_layer < 0, the layer is ignored.
        Parameters:
        p_shape - a ConvexShape object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_ignore_net_nos - an array of int.
        p_clearance_class - a int.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • overlapping_items

        public java.util.Set<Item> overlapping_items(Area p_area,
                                             int p_layer)
        Returns all items on layer p_layer, which overlap with p_area. If p_layer < 0, the layer is ignored
        Parameters:
        p_area - a Area object.
        p_layer - a int.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

      • check_shape

        public boolean check_shape(Area p_shape,
                           int p_layer,
                           int[] p_net_no_arr,
                           int p_cl_class)
        Checks, if the an object with shape p_shape and net nos p_net_no_arr and clearance class p_cl_class can be inserted on layer p_layer without clearance violation.
        Parameters:
        p_shape - a Area object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_cl_class - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • check_trace_shape

        public boolean check_trace_shape(TileShape p_shape,
                                 int p_layer,
                                 int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                 int p_cl_class,
                                 java.util.Set<Pin> p_contact_pins)
        Checks, if the a trace line with shape p_shape and net numbers p_net_no_arr and clearance class p_cl_class can be inserted on layer p_layer without clearance violation. If p_contact_pins != null, all pins not contained in p_contact_pins are regarded as obstacles, even if they are of the own net.
        Parameters:
        p_shape - a TileShape object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_cl_class - a int.
        p_contact_pins - a Set object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

                                    int p_layer,
                                    int p_pen_half_width,
                                    int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                    int p_clearance_class)

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics p_graphics,
                 GraphicsContext p_graphics_context)
        Draws all items of the board on their visible layers. Called in the overwritten paintComponent method of a class derived from JPanel. The value of p_layer_visibility is expected between 0 and 1 for each layer.
        Parameters:
        p_graphics - a Graphics object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.
        p_graphics_context - a GraphicsContext object.

      • pick_items

        public java.util.Set<Item> pick_items(Point p_location,
                                      int p_layer,
                                      ItemSelectionFilter p_filter)
        Returns the list of items on the board, whose shape on layer p_layer contains the point at p_location. If p_layer < 0, the layer is ignored. If p_item_selection_filter != null, only items of types selected by the filter are picked.
        Parameters:
        p_location - a Point object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_filter - a ItemSelectionFilter object.
        Returns:
        a Set object.

                                   int p_net_no)

      • undo

        public boolean undo(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> p_changed_nets)
        Restores the sitiation at the previous snapshot. Returns false, if no more undo is possible. Puts the numbers of the changed nets into the set p_changed_nets, if p_changed_nets != null
        Parameters:
        p_changed_nets - a Set object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • redo

        public boolean redo(java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> p_changed_nets)
        Restores the sitiation before the last undo. Returns false, if no more redo is possible. Puts the numbers of the changed nets into the set p_changed_nets, if p_changed_nets != null
        Parameters:
        p_changed_nets - a Set object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • generate_snapshot

        public void generate_snapshot()
        Makes the current board situation restorable by undo.

      • pop_snapshot

        public boolean pop_snapshot()
        Removes the top snapshot from the undo stack, so that its situation cannot be restored any more. Returns false, if no more snapshot could be popped.
        Returns:
        a boolean.
